verses.verse: 'Now <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H2398>sins,<s%> after he <S%H8085>hears<s%> a <S%H6963>public<s%> <S%H423>adjuration<s%> [to testify], when he is a <S%H5707>witness,<s%> <S%H176>whether<s%> he has <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> [otherwise] <S%H3045>known,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> he does not <S%H5046>tell<s%> [it], then he will <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>guilt.<s%>

<S%H176>'Or<s%> <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> <S%H176>whether<s%> a <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H9130>beast,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>cattle,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H8318>swarming<s%> <S%H8318>things,<s%> though it is <S%H5956>hidden<s%> from him, and he is <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> then he will be <S%H816>guilty.<s%>

<S%H176>'Or<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> he <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H120>human<s%> <S%H2932>uncleanness,<s%> of <S%H3605>whatever<s%> [sort] his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> [may] be with <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H2930>becomes<s%> <S%H2930>unclean,<s%> and it is <S%H5956>hidden<s%> from him, and then he comes to <S%H3045>know<s%> [it], he will be <S%H816>guilty.<s%>

<S%H176>'Or<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H7650>swears<s%> <S%H981>thoughtlessly<s%> with his <S%H8193>lips<s%> to <S%H7489>do<s%> <S%H7489>evil<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> to <S%H3190>do<s%> <S%H3190>good,<s%> in <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> matter a <S%H120>man<s%> may <S%H981>speak<s%> <S%H981>thoughtlessly<s%> with an <S%H7621>oath,<s%> and it is <S%H5956>hidden<s%> from him, and then he comes to <S%H3045>know<s%> [it], he will be <S%H816>guilty<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H428>these.<s%>

'So it shall be <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H816>becomes<s%> <S%H816>guilty<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H428>these,<s%> that he shall <S%H3034>confess<s%> that in <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>sinned.<s%>

'He shall also <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for his <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>committed,<s%> a <S%H5347>female<s%> from the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> a <S%H3776>lamb<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H8166>goat<s%> <S%H5795><s%> as a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering.<s%> So the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> on his <S%H5921>behalf<s%> for his <S%H9128>sin.<s%>

'But <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H5060>afford<s%> <S%H3027><s%> a <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> then he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> his <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering<s%> for that in <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

'And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> them to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> who shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> is for the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and shall <S%H4454>nip<s%> its <S%H7218>head<s%> at the <S%H4136>front<s%> of its <S%H6203>neck,<s%> but he shall not <S%H914>sever<s%> [it.]

'He shall also <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> on the <S%H7023>side<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> while the <S%H7604>rest<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be <S%H4680>drained<s%> out at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> it is a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering.<s%>

'The <S%H8145>second<s%> he shall then <S%H6213>prepare<s%> as a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinance.<s%> So the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> on his <S%H5921>behalf<s%> for his <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>committed,<s%> and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him.

'But <S%H518>if<s%> his <S%H3027>means<s%> are <S%H5381>insufficient<s%> for <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> then for his <S%H7133>offering<s%> for that <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering;<s%> he shall not <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on it or <S%H5414>place<s%> <S%H3828>incense<s%> on it, for it is a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering.<s%>

'And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> it to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7061>take<s%> his <S%H4393>handful<s%> <S%H7062><s%> of it as its <S%H234>memorial<s%> <S%H234>portion<s%> and <S%H6999>offer<s%> [it] up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> with the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> by <S%H801>fire:<s%> it is a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering.<s%>

'So the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him <S%H5921>concerning<s%> his <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>committed<s%> from <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H428>these,<s%> and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him; then [the rest] shall <S%H1961>become<s%> the priest's, like the grain <S%H4503>offering.<s%>' "

<S%H3588>"If<s%> a <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H4603>acts<s%> <S%H4604>unfaithfully<s%> and <S%H2398>sins<s%> <S%H7684>unintentionally<s%> <S%H4480>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>things,<s%> then he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering<s%> to the Lord: a <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect<s%> from the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> according to your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> in <S%H3701>silver<s%> by <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> in [terms of] the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> for a <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering.<s%>

"And he shall <S%H9608>make<s%> <S%H9608>restitution<s%> for that <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>sinned<s%> <S%H4480>against<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>thing,<s%> and shall <S%H3254>add<s%> to it a <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2549>part<s%> of it, and <S%H5414>give<s%> it to the <S%H3548>priest.<s%> The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall then <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him with the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering,<s%> and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him.

"Now <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H2398>sins<s%> and <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> of the things <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H4687>commanded<s%> not to be <S%H6213>done,<s%> though he was <S%H3045>unaware,<s%> <S%H3808><s%> still he is <S%H816>guilty,<s%> and shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>punishment.<s%>

"He is then to <S%H935>bring<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> a <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect<s%> from the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> according to your <S%H6187>valuation,<s%> for a <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering.<s%> So the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him <S%H5921>concerning<s%> his <S%H7684>error<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7683>sinned<s%> <S%H7684>unintentionally<s%> and did not <S%H3045>know<s%> [it], and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him.
"It is a <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering;<s%> he was <S%H816>certainly<s%> <S%H816>guilty<s%> before the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"
